sections.heading: money; use.Grant money may be used by eligible recipients in meeting the special housing needs of individuals including meals, transportation, counseling, housekeeping, care management, and personal emergency response needs

sections.text:
68-1606.Grant money; use.

Grant money may be used by eligible recipients in meeting the special housing needs of individuals including meals, transportation, counseling, housekeeping, care management, and personal emergency response needs.

SourceLaws 1992, LB 1192, ยง 6.
